Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2014 11:07PM Ashira wrote: I love Henna, made by Lush. I discovered it when I developed an allergy to hair dye a few years back. The downside to it is that you can't color over it if you don't like the color,  but if your hair is short, it could be a good time to experiment. If you don't like it, just let it go.  Of course you are limited in your color selection, but you may like to have a look.
